name: Bridge V+
description:
Welcome to the 2018 edition of Bridge. Featuring a faster and smoother user interface along with a stronger state of the art artificial intelligence engine, the 2018 edition celebrates 15 years of ZingMagic and over 35 years bringing you the best in Bridge card games.

Still the best free Duplicate, Chicago and Rubber Bridge card game in town, anytime, anywhere.

Bridge V+ supports the 3 primary variants of the card game of Bridge: Rubber, Chicago and Duplicate Bridge.

In Rubber Bridge a rubber is played as the best of three games. A game is won by the first partnership to score 100 or more points in successful contracts.

In Chicago Bridge you play four hands of Bridge. The winner is the partnership that scores the most points in those hands.

In Duplicate Bridge the same hands are played by each partnership that has entered a tournament. The winner is the partnership that scores the most points.

Please note that Duplicate Bridge tournaments can be played for virtual or real money. To comply with current legislation real money tournaments are only available to over 18s in a limited set of territories. Device location must be enabled to ensure eligibility.

A huge thanks to all those who have taken the time to contact us with suggestions, comments and criticisms!, please keep them coming.

Support:
If you encounter issues with Bridge please email support-at-zingmagic-dot-com so we can provide assistance.

Ad funded:
This game is ad funded. This allows us to offer the game for free but generate some income to help develop and support the product. We are aware that not everyone likes adverts so you can remove them via the single IAP if thats your preference.

Ads reappearing:
We are aware that sometimes ads reappear after purchasing the 'ad-free' IAP, e.g if you uninstall then re-install Bridge. To tell Bridge to re-fetch the purchase receipt, choose the 'Buy now' menu option in the Bridge app. Then choose the 'Restore' button to login to your iTunes account so Bridge can find the receipt.

Privacy info:
Please note that this game is ad-funded. The advertising and social media services use anonymous device identifiers, local storage and cookies. By downloading and continuing to use this game you consent to this information being collected and shared with our advertising and social media partners.
